attributes.action: Put a vote to the public whether Boris Johnson should be taken out of Office.
attributes.additional_details: To protect our future as Boris and his party are ruining everyone's future. Our kids have no hope.
attributes.background: Put up a country wide vote to see whether the general public wants Boris in office or not.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign, or for votes on the same.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
